issue.title: [C++] Add SparseTensor.ToTensor() method
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6624](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6624). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have functionality to convert (dense) tensors to sparse tensors, but not the other way around. Also [see discussion](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4446#issuecomment-503792308).
